pages.text: Most discs are dropped from a $(l:creatures/monster-creeper)$(thing)Creeper$() when killed by any $(l:creatures/undead-skeleton)$(thing)Skeleton$() or $(l:creatures/undead-stray)$(thing)Stray$() or generates as chest loot. $(br2)The exception is one disk that has to be crafted from its parts and one that has to be found in $(l:rare/suspicious_sand)$(item)Suspicious Sand$() of $(l:world/structures#trail_ruin)$(thing)Trail Ruins$(). $(br2)They can be played on a $(l:useables/jukebox)$(item)Jukebox$().
